mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID AS userId , U.USER_PASSWORD AS userPassword , U.USER_NAME AS userName , U.USER_EMAIL AS userEmail FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId} AND U.USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) AS CHECK_YN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userName});
